name: Umbrella Corporation
startIntroPart1: Welcome, Oswell E Spencer, the visionary founder and leader of Umbrella Corporation. Your brilliance in science and ruthless ambition have propelled Umbrella to the forefront of global influence. From humble beginnings, you have built a corporation that transcends conventional boundaries, delving into the deepest realms of scientific research and technological advancement.
startIntroPart2: With your relentless drive for progress, will you lead Umbrella to ultimate supremacy, outpacing all rivals and rewriting the very fabric of civilization? Will your new empire shine through the ages of history?
declaringWar: Prepare for the full might of Umbrella Corporation!
attacked: You dare to challenge Umbrella? Your folly will be your undoing.
defeated: This setback is but a momentary lapse. Umbrella will rise again.
introduction: I am Oswell E Spencer, founder of Umbrella Corporation. Together, we can achieve greatness.
tradeRequest: Let's discuss terms that will benefit both our enterprises.
uniques: [+10]% Great Person generation in all cities
[+10]% Production [in cities with a [Viral Research Lab]]
[+1 Science, +1 Gold] from every [Trade route] connected to a city with a [Pharmaceutical Plant] or [Viral Research Lab]
